fields.name: mov_basename
fields.title: MOV basename
fields.description: The base name for the video file: just the filename with no extension e.g. CAMHDA301-20160506T060000Z.

fields.name: date_time
fields.title: Date/Time
fields.description: UTC start time for video file as derived from file name (not actual clock time when video was started).

fields.name: start_frame
fields.title: Start Frame
fields.description: Frame number for start of static region.

fields.name: end_frame
fields.title: End Frame
fields.description: Frame number for end of static region.

fields.name: scene_tag
fields.title: Scene Tag
fields.description: Descriptive scene tag applied to scene.
